hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
DOCKER_EP=$(python -c 'import socket; print socket.gethostbyname("docker-registry.default")'):5000 INTEGRATION=integration PROD=prod
for repo in apiserver camel frontend webserver; do sudo docker pull $DOCKER_EP/$INTEGRATION/$repo:latest sudo docker tag -f $DOCKER_EP/$INTEGRATION/$repo:latest $DOCKER_EP/$PROD/$repo:latest sudo docker push $DOCKER_EP/$PROD/$repo:latest done
